website_summaries.verdict: A straightforward holder that works to keep your toothbrushes and toothpaste in one place.
pros: Compact dimensions don't require much space
Good capacity with four toothbrush slots and a toothpaste and razor compartment
cons: Open frame design allows water to pool on surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Did what it promised.
customer_reviews.text: I keep seeing comments about this product rusting. If you’re going to pay for something this cheap you have to be ready to spray it with a clear enamel. I use Rust-Oleum’s crystal clear enamel. I mean that’s just second hand nature to me when I buy anything with stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: This got fantastic reviews which is why I purchased it. I was tired of cleaning out muck from the bottom of a cup. BUT this smaller then expected. It’s holds 4 standard toothbrushes but the part that supposedly os for toothpaste is tiny. I mean teeny. I can’t even fit a standard size toothpaste tube and my sons tiny toddler toothpaste. It’s that small. So instead I don’t bother keeping the toothpaste tubes in it at all which kind of defeats the point of having this.
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: BEST TOOTHBRUSH HOLDER!
customer_reviews.text: This is more sanitary than your traditional toothbrush holder. I don't like the cup-like holders that keep all the dirty run off at the bottom. This is nice and open which allows any extra moisture to dry quickly. If need be, I can simply pick up the toothbrush holder and wipe the sink. I like the look of this toothbrush holder and I love that my electric toothbrush fits too! This seems very well made and I appreciate the extra thought that was put into this design such as the rubber feet that were added to the bottom of the holder. This even came with 5 toothbrush covers, very thoughtful!
customer_reviews.author: Wells FamilyTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine in the mail and I love it. I used to just throw my stuff in a corner on the sink but now there's so much room on the counter. The large size was able to hold pretty much everything I use: an electric toothbrush, regular toothbrush, two toothpastes, a pore vacuum, floss, and tongue scraper. There's even some space leftover. The black color is nice - we'll see if it peels off in the future, but for now it looks very sleek and neat. The best part is that it doesn't take up space. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Rusts Fast and All Over
customer_reviews.text: There are not many organizers that could hold a full tube of toothpaste, 2 toothbrushes & a Venus razor. I loved the functional and minimal design. I used it lightly in a bathroom with ceiling fan, lightly used by one person. Unfortunately I wasted my money on this item as it rusted all over shortly after I purchased the item. The return window has closed but I would still like my money back as it is now garbage and definitely not rustproof. I bought other stainless steel rust proof bathroom items from amazon and they are still going strong. This item is a fake.
customer_reviews.author: SanJoseMacarons

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I love it so much I'm taking the time to leave a review for a TOOTHBRUSH HOLDER.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a large city in a one-bathroom apartment with a dreaded pedestal sink. Point being: Space is at a premium and my counter space is basically non-existent. This little gizmo has made me way happier than a toothbrush holder should. It's slim. It holds the toothpaste with the toothbrushes and the pads on the feet keep it from slipping. Not to mention the fact that it cannot pool gross water at the bottom since it's open. Love it. So happy to own it!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin S.

customer_reviews.title: Not stainless steel.
customer_reviews.text: This is not stainless steel. Chrome plated and rust if left wet.
customer_reviews.author: Billwleod

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This works exactly how I wanted it to work. Keeps yuck off that comes with putting the tooth brushes and toothpaste container in a cup. I combined it with the InterDesign Gia Kitchen Counter/Sink Soap Dish so I wouldn't have to keep wiping the drainage off the counter. Took the rubber feet off and it fits well into the grid of the soap dish.
customer_reviews.author: Censored Here

customer_reviews.title: Compact, sturdy toothbrush holder
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for - a simple, basic holder for toothbrushes and toothpaste. The stainless steel adds clean and contemporary lines and is sturdy enough to hold everything in place without tipping over. This is a compact holder that organizes everything in a small amount of space.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Great holder for small spaces!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small bathroom in our apartment and I have to be very careful with what I put in it so it doesn’t take up too much space. This little holder is the perfect size. It’s currently holding 2 toothbrushes and 2 different toothpastes with more room. It fits easily behind the handles to my sink. I love it! It keeps everything nice and dry. I highly recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: FamilyofLove

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Super sturdy--it won't bend up. It has rubber feet so it stays on the sink without sliding. I especially like that it is fully open. No more gross bottoms of the cup. No more sneaky filth on our toothbrushes. It's a great look for my old-fashioned looking bathroom. I also like that it will fit in the medicine cabinet when I need to hide it for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Gwynne

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality- went rust after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these, used it for my toothbrushes. One of the holders became copletely rusted after a few weeks of regular use. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Love the organization of my dental supplies!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple toothbrush holders and I either had to keep up with cleaning, or it had suction cups to the mirror and it would fall off and I would have to try to push back into place and it would fall again! This perfectly organizes my electric toothbrush, tongue wiper, flosser, tooth spray, and toothpaste all in one! I bought the larger one to have the ability to organize everything!
customer_reviews.author: Mindday

customer_reviews.title: Rusty!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this thing for 4 months and it is rusty already. Save your money. Regular use and cleaning but it still got rusty.
customer_reviews.author: mindy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing item!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a storage catty for so long that would be easy to clean and also housed both my tooth brush and my husband. Not only does it have four spaces for well sized tooth brushes or razors, it has a space for your tooth paste or a similar sized item. It even came with 5 toothbrush covers which was nice!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lee

customer_reviews.title: Impulse purchase gone wrong
customer_reviews.text: This was on sale, so I ordered it on impulse. It looks like it was put together in a middle school shop class -- none of the wires are straight. The spaces at the bottom are too big, so the bottom of the toothbrush slips through and sits on the counter. I don't believe it's made of stainless steel, as stated. I'm sure it will rust soon, and then I'll just go back to using a glass.
customer_reviews.author: Flannery

customer_reviews.title: starting to rust
customer_reviews.text: nice size etc, but is starting to rust after just a few months. other than that important defect its wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Rusts after just a few weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Rust!!!! I bought 3 of these, all began to rust just weeks after using them. Stainless steel means nothing if this rusts. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: MD in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The chrome doesn't last long, it rusted in 3 months, i do not recommend. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Blujay56

customer_reviews.title: Great bathroom counter organizer, just what I needed :))
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to put my toothbrush, razors, and toothpaste in that would keep it off the counter and allow them to dry. I saw this in a store and just couldn't find the right thing, so I found this item. The two small compartments are made for razors or toothbrushes, so it forces them to stay standing, which is great. The toothpaste compartment is perfectly sized as well. It sits well on my counter and is easy to clean up and easy to move. The shipping was fast and no problems, came in a small box with extra end caps for the feet in case you lose any. Thank you for a very useful item!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Toms

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: It even comes with extra little gummy feet so the metal doesn't scratch the countertop. This holds 4 toothbrushes and we use the ones with the fat handles and they fit. It also holds two tubes of toothpaste so it's a great space saver. The design matches anything and it's easy to clean. With only a small counter next to the sink this was a great purchase to keep all the toothbrushes and toothpaste in one small space. The little gummy feet on the bottom of the metal parts keep it from scratching the counter. Great purchase - we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah F.

customer_reviews.title: We bought three
customer_reviews.text: We like that it is small and compact, and that it stands on small legs so all water drains out, keeping both the holder and the toothbrush holders dry and clean. We bought two for one bathroom and ended up ordering a third one for another bathroom. We're very happy with this toothbrush holder and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: LCGreen

customer_reviews.title: Not stainless steel! It rusts, and badly.
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice, perfect shape and size. Looks beautiful. Works great! Sadly, this is NOT stainless steel. It has badly rusted and left rust stains on my counter. If it were actually stainless steel as advertised, it would easily earn five stars. Instead, I'd give it zero stars if I could. Sadly, I have to throw this in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Zootal

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I was tired of cleaning out mold and gunk from the holder cups. Exactly what I wanted, perfect size not bulky and just big enough to hold our thick handle brushes and a tube of paste. Very sturdy and comes with clear silicone caps of the legs so as not to scratch the surface. They even include a package of toothbrush tip covers with each of these.
customer_reviews.author: Mariya A Dolgopolova

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I jus got mine in the mail so I haven't experienced anything "bad" yet. If anything should arise I will edit this post. 1. It came a day late. No biggie 2. As far as size goes it is what I expected 3. I was able to put 4 tooth brushes toothpaste in holder. 4. It has helped a lot with decluttering my bathroom sink. Also comon sense for me is to spray all stainless steel appliance down with a protected so I did that so we will see if I have any rust issues
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to keep our toothbrushes better separated than they are in a cup (cold, flu season and all that). This does that, but note that it is small and very tippy. We moved it from an shelf to the sink counter so that we can hold it with one hand while getting things in and out of it so that it doesn't go over forward. You have to work at it a bit to get an ordinary rubberized toothbrush handle into it because they are somewhat fatter than this comfortably accommodates. If I had it to do over again, I would buy a slightly larger, sturdier one for more stability and less frustration with use.
customer_reviews.author: Heather V

customer_reviews.title: Simple and efficient, but slightly small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toothbrush holder, because our other one kept building up gunk on the bottom, and I'm hoping this holder will stop that, but I won't know if it works to that affect for some time! Otherwise, upon first inspection I like the look and simplicity of it, although mine was slightly off balance, which is odd though not terribly noticeable. Only other downside is that it's quite small and cannot fit electric toothbrushes in the 4 main toothbrush compartments. That's not shocking based on the photos, but it would be nice. On the bright side, I can fit a tube of toothpaste and my boyfriend's electric toothbrush in the larger compartment even though it's a bit tight.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hutton

customer_reviews.title: The 2  we bought rusted in less than 8 months!
customer_reviews.text: Bought (2) less than 8 months ago & they are horribly rusted. Please dont waste your money. These were bought to replace similar ones from another company. Those i had for almost 20 years!!! I am seriously disappointed. These look nice for about 2 minutes. They are the design i love but obviosly coated cheaply!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Two stars for the price paid...
customer_reviews.text: And you pay for what you get I suppose. Cheap, not polished, "exquisite welding" must have been done by a toddler (nothing against toddler skills), but the thing is cheap. If you need something to get you by instead of using a cup that holds water that drips down your toothbrush, then fine. If you're looking for quality that won't rust, don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: House Manager

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on our little sink. It even came with two extra rubber caps for the feet (to protect the porcelain). It’s light weight but holds a sams club size of toothpaste easy without tipping over. I missed the fact it came with toothbrush covers so that was a fun surprise. I love not having to get the grime out of the bottom of toothbrush “cup holders” anymore. I just wipe up the sink as normal. I put the soap next to it in the picture to show the size since our faucet & toothpaste ase are a bit oversized.
customer_reviews.author: Kcrew

customer_reviews.title: Very nice nd is a nice size
customer_reviews.text: It came with extra little rubber pieces for the bottom of the holder and also came with a pack of 5 or 6 toothbrush head protectors which was very nice. The holder itself is very nice, sturdy, and big enough to fit 5 toothbrushe and 3 toothpastes in it which is very convenient for our household. Definitely worth the money nd if I ever need a new one I'll definitely be buying another again
customer_reviews.author: A.moy6911

customer_reviews.title: WILL RUST! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last Fall and it didn't take long for it to totally rust. The whole thing became brown. We keep our house cool at 72 degrees fahrenheit and the shower would just occasionally get humid. DO NOT BUY!! I would put up a photo of it but my mom already threw it out..
customer_reviews.author: Sayyed Gilani

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything nicely
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can fit a battery operated toothbrush in one slot along with regular toothbrushes in other slots. Also 2 larger spaces for toothpaste or another battery operated toothbrush. I placed mine on a white washcloth so I simply have to replace washcloth with clean one when I clean my bathroom. I bought the multi packof washcloths from Amazon. The brand is Amazon Basic.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Blenman

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my toothbrushes and paste organized and clean!
customer_reviews.text: After using cups to hold our toothbrushes and paste, I decided I need something that can keep them up but also not have grime build up. I deiced on this steel holder and I am pleased! I could hold three brushes and one paste and could hold more. it keep everything organized and clean and there is no grime build up at the bottom, It is easy to clean with dish washing soap and a sponge. I haven't seen any rust on it at all. Very pleased with this holder.
customer_reviews.author: A. C

customer_reviews.title: Holds 4 toothbrushes and 2 tubes of toothpaste. Serves the purpose at a quality bargain!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a toothbrush holder and it didn’t initially even cross my mind that it would be useful to have a spot for the toothpaste as well. I’m pleasantly pleased with this toothbrush holder. It’s compact and although not the most aesthetically pleasing it serves it’s purpose well. Little plastic covers on the feet keep it from slipping and getting knocked around. Very sturdy and doesn’t feel cheap. I was worried it would take up too much space, but I find it to have the opposite effect. Space for 4 tooth brushes and two tubes of toothpaste. As a bonus they included 5 complimentary brush head covers in different colors! An unexpected delight! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Alanah B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for Way More than Toothbrushes!
customer_reviews.text: I have a number of cream & make-up tubes (Boots No 7) that stand on their caps to keep cream ready to be squeezed onto your finger. They kept falling over. The traditional, clear plexiglass make-up holders were too shallow for these tubes. Then I spotted this toothbrush holder. It is perfect! It arrived quickly and if you needed to, you could throw it in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: luvobx

customer_reviews.title: Things I like about this toothbrush holder are
customer_reviews.text: Things I like about this toothbrush holder are ; it is compact and fits on the counter nicely without taking up too much space. There are four spaces which we use for toothbrushes (including my electric toothbrush) and razors. The space for the toothpaste is plenty roomy for 2 tubes of toothpaste if needed. The bottom has small rubber stoppers which keeps this holder from sliding. It is just what we were looking for and I give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic size and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I decided I was interested in a toothbrush holder that was something more aerated for bacteria's sake because I was getting really grossed out by any built-up water or bacteria at the bottom of my previous holder. I found this and was so happy and think the stainless steel construction holds true and is great quality. The holes are the perfect size for 99% of toothpastes and toothbrushes and Im really happy about this purchase esp. with the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you don't want to clean a mess buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I was so tired of those bathroom containers for the toothbrushes. They were always so gross on the bottom. More so because I have teenagers whose job it is to clean the bathroom. You know how that goes! I saw these and thought give it a try. Well they are not flimsy and have enough space for the brushes and the toothpaste. On mine I put make up brushes since it is just my one toothbrush. I love that there is no awful stuff at the bottom. I was pleasantly surprised at the durability of it and glad that I bought one for each bathroom! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something small to put INSIDE my medicine cabinet so there is less things on my counter/sink area. This one is perfect! It's small enough but offers plenty of space to hold toothbrushes, toothpaste (and backups). I also like the little rubber pieces on the bottom legs of the holder.... This will prevent any rust or scratches to the medicine cabinet. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: Good organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for organizing toothbrushes and toothpaste and looks great on the counter top. I like that it keeps the toothbrushes separate and drains out the bottom so there isn’t that crud that accumulated in the bottom of a typical holder. All you need to do is move it aside and clean under when you wipe your vanity top down when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: MomNana

customer_reviews.title: keeps counter organized
customer_reviews.text: This product really does keep my bathroom clutter organized. It fits an electric toothbrush, toothbrush, toothpaste, daily contacts etc rather than having these things scattered over my counter top. This came with 4 extra plastic base caps. It is easy to clean because the wire bottom is open and does not pool the runoff from the toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Jm

customer_reviews.title: Didn't meet expections
customer_reviews.text: Looking for something that's easy to clean-accomplished this is easy to clean. Looking for something that was open for the whole toothbrush so it can get aired out when not in use-accomplished this is great for that as well. Looking for something that it all fits in-not accomplished if you are using all four toothbrush holders they touch eachother at the brush part also the bottom corners of the toohpaste tend to get caught up in the bars
customer_reviews.author: mary geigle

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to but......
customer_reviews.text: Have the small, holds slandered toothbrushes and full size toothpaste just fine. Love the ability to drip dry clean. Do not like the RUST that builds up, and the drips leaves rust residue on my counter top which is hard to clean off. I don't understand how this has so many great reviews, other than people are quick to write a review before truly using a product.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Functional.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on the shelf in our medicine cabinet. Our toothbrushes no longer rest on the wall, door, or each other like they did when they were in a cup. Only downfall is the shelf will need wiped off more often considering my husband never quite gets all the toothpaste rinsed off his toothbrush and it drips. That's the way she goes..
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have one of those clear ones that I got from Walmart or target.. I hated that there would be water stains and toothpaste build up on the bottom after a few months.. so I decided to get this one. I love it! much easier to Clean, doesn't show stains and work wells! holds my tooth brush and tooth paste with no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for bathrooms!
customer_reviews.text: It is as described on the item descriptions and it is small enough to fit anywhere near your sink. The frame seems and feels pretty sturdy and reliable enough for use in the bathroom and to last fairly long. It also came with a set of toothbrush cases which really made my experience with the purchase highly satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Gunhyung Steve Park

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It fits perfectly on top of my sink which is designed it differently than most things. My color scheme is black and light with a little dark blue in my bathroom, or my black and white color scheme bedroom. Not only does it look well, and fit,well, it does not jiggle or seem to be able to fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Hall

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for our master bathroom. I placed 2 toothbrushes and a tube of toothpaste in it and it tipped over. Very flimsy. It’s now pushed up against the backsplash to keep it from tipping over. It’s a clever idea and serves its purpose but needs to be sturdier. Will use until I can find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Dee F

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the kids bathroom. I like that the water drains out and doesn't collect anywhere. There is plenty if room for their toothbrushes and toothpaste, and having it on the sink basin means the kids put the toothbrushes and toothpaste back where they belong. It is a simple style that looks great in my bathroom and quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me!! I love it and wished I had found it sooner. While it may be odd, toothbrush holders are important to me. I need something that will prevent my toothbrush from touching anyone else’s but I also need it easy to clean and the fact that this also holds the toothpaste is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Whitecotton

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I found this holder for my bathroom. My home was built in the late 80's so the master bath is basically a standard size bathroom with limited space. This is perfect for my sink and has space for a tube of toothpaste. I found the item to be true to the photo and a decent item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jack4579

customer_reviews.title: Better with fat toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Has 4 dividers for toothbrushes and one large pocket for the toothpaste. Not good for pump-style toothpaste (tube too large) or for basic toothbrushes (brushes fall through). Not sure if the stainless will eventually get pitted from all the water. Comes with little silicone feet to help protect countertops.
customer_reviews.author: RisCracker

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: This was for my son in his bathroom. He needed something. He picked this one and it's exactly what he wanted. Exactly what it looks like and so far no issues with it. Personally, as a mother and having experience with many types of toothbrush holders for kids, I get annoyed with anything that isn't easy to clean and doesn't drain liquid out. Kids tend to make messes and then mold or nastiness grows in the bottom of things. This solves those problems. It also came with toothbrush covers. I didn't expect that, but it was nice and my kids liked them. Shipped quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: coffee and tea

customer_reviews.title: fits in the cabinet
customer_reviews.text: We have only been using it for a week so I can't so too much about durability, etc, but I am very pleased with the product so far. My biggest concerns were having something to fit in the cabinet and that the kids would use it. I have a tiny bathroom with no cover space and this solves the toothbrush dilemma perfectly. It looks neater and cleaner than traditional toothbrush cup type holders and I think it is easier to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: NOT stainless steel in color
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a small version of this toothbrush holder and it was a bit smaller than expected. It seems to do the job although I’m disappointed that I sought after a ‘stainless steel’ toothbrush holder to match my bathroom fixtures and although it may be made of stainless steel, the finish is certainly a glossier chrome finish. I will be storing it under the sink to avoid the color clash.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Adams

customer_reviews.title: Rust Central
customer_reviews.text: I love the simple design and how it opens out at the bottom to let water flow instead of gathering mold. HOWEVER, this bad boy is a ruster. Not only three months, and it looks worse than when my car grill when I found a bird trapped inside. Who knows how long that's been in there. Anyway, I think it's a little odd that this toothbrush holder, designed to be in the proximity of water, rusts. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: skyfox02

customer_reviews.title: Wishing I had bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: Regretting not buying this sooner......my toothpaste finally is off the counter and organized in this caddy. My only complaint is that its a bit wobbly or uneven but for the few times we're touching a day.....not a deal breaker. When this one is beyond cleaning or repair, will definitely buy again. #spacesaving #cleanlooking
customer_reviews.author: Twid_mom

customer_reviews.title: Arrived covered in rust, very strong odor in box
customer_reviews.text: Gross. Product arrived covered in rust, the feet had rust stains. The box had a very strong perfume type of odor as well. Obviously, I can't use this as a toothbrush holder if it rusts this easily.
customer_reviews.author: Penitent Tangent

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, and I do realize how lame that makes me... loving a toothbrush holder. I don't have to worry about the bottom getting moldy and this holds everything perfectly. I have been using this for a couple of months now, and there hasn't been any fading or flaking of the product. In addition, my kiddo (very picky teen) keeps stealing this from my bathroom. I suppose I should buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed and much easier to keep clean than the lucite square holder I used before. Fits well on my sink’s small edge. Hold 4 toothbrushes and 2 small to medium toothpaste tubes. Perfect for my needs. It comes with 2 extra plastic/rubber feet covers too! Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth  A Norton

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great little toothbrush/toothpaste holder. Nothing fancy, but aesthetically pleasing and functional. Arrived quickly and came with 5 bonus plastic toothbrush covers, which I thought was really nice. Price was excellent as well. Cheaper than what I’d pay at Walmart for something similar. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's not stainless steel.
customer_reviews.text: It may be poorly chrome plated. We live in Arizona, and it sits on our bathroom counter. Outside of morning shower time, our bathroom is not humid. The only water that comes directly in touch with the metal comes from my wet tooth brush twice a day. After six months the holder started to rust, and now, after 10 months, it's badly rusted and ready to throw away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves space and looks sturdy easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We just got two electric brushes and didn’t have any space for them. These are perfect for housing both phillips as well as Oral’B models. We even placed the electric charger in one of the compartments. So now we can charge and store the brishes plus regular brushes and his and hers tooth paste all in the same organizer. This is highly recommended if you want to save space.
customer_reviews.author: Yoo R. Amayzin

customer_reviews.title: Nice organizer for the bathroom counter
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every day to store my toothbrush, toothpaste, razor, and other items. It helps to keep some clutter off the bathroom counter and organize the items I need. I have had this product for 5 months and I would but it again no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: S. Waller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to keep clean toothbrush holder
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for something simple to put the toothpaste and toothbrush in. This is a great little stand, and is easy to keep clean. I initially was looking for a closed one, but glad I bought this one. The bottom is open so no water sits in there after you use your toothbrush. I do wish it was a little more sturdy. It is pretty light. However, it does what I needed it to do, and for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: ab

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Bought two of these. Each arrived well packed, within an attractive product box. Manufacturer included four adjustable clear rubber tips to keep metal feet level and free from scratching countertops. Daughter very pleased with hers and so am I with mine. Highly recommend this purchase. Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: Cat  Mamma

customer_reviews.title: We have been using this for a few months now ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for a few months now. While it does help us keep the bathroom sink more organized, it is already rusting in areas. In addition, the metal wiring is not close enough going up the front that our toothbrushes keep falling out through the front slotting.
customer_reviews.author: TheTay

customer_reviews.title: Clean way to tidy up the bathroom at a great cost!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, clean and stylish addition to your bathroom! Hold tooth brushes accordingly without toothpaste residue build up in the bottom or sides. Super easy to clean and doesn’t look cheap. Holds our two tooth brushes and tooth paste without being too bulky. I’m very pleased with this in comparison to others I’ve had in the past that were not open and held all the tooth paste residue, excess water from the toothbrush and GERMS!
customer_reviews.author: BreD

customer_reviews.title: Current toothbrush holder broke, this thing is tidy, clean, neat! Holds it ALL!
customer_reviews.text: For years i had things laying on my counter, this handy holder cleaned it all up. Was so good i bought another one for the other bathroom (both different sizes)...holds toothbrushes, floss, toothpaste, etc. Looks clean, easy to clean, sturdy, and just love it! Highly recommended if you want your bathroom looking tidy, clean, and neat!
customer_reviews.author: Arrr Matey

customer_reviews.title: Boot scoot and boogie.
customer_reviews.text: Storage capacity you ask? I filled this thing up with wrenches, tampons, wood markers, old cigarette butts..store anything you want and as much as you want. I got 13 5mm sockets in the bigger compartments, I smashed a few baby carrot in the smaller square holes, perfect to feed my tarantulas. Did you know tarantulas eat carrots? Hint, they don’t. But you can slam some toothbrushes in this hog, I wiggled my fiancé’s electric toothbrush charger snug in the whisker biscuits and the cord fits through so you can attach it to the juice generator. Thanks for the gnar gnar wire storage, y’all keep making top notch stuff, I’ll keep buying the products.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas pereau

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Little Cady
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my bathroom sink clutter free all while complimenting the decor. I plan on buying one for every bathroom and office desk. This could even be a great paintbrush holder for organizing specific brushes needed for a single canvas. It's quite versatile!
customer_reviews.author: DDR

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room for 4 toothbrushes, although I only need space for two. Fits a standard sized tube of toothpaste easily. Could probably fit two in it. Easy to wipe up underneath it unlike other holders that build up scum and nastiness. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah AK

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on a deal day and got it for a great price. I didn't realize how small it was but it works for a family of 3. I love how it came with toothbrush caps but they are a little hard to open. It works for our bathroom as we needed an updated toothbrush holder. This works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Petitti

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist organizer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy, received quick as usual per amazon! Great product and very nice looking. It was a tight squeeze into mirror door but it was totally worth it. I can leave my sink completely free and clean. Very sturdy and love the black color blends in quite well. Thank you for product!
customer_reviews.author: Guilmer Alexander Carcamo

customer_reviews.title: Cool organizer. Works well for my family
customer_reviews.text: Stores a lot, is easy to clean. But you have to clean each bar. Sometimes your toothbrush or toothpast will go through one of the side bars, on accident. Its slightly inconvenient, but doesn't really bother us. Is great for people with small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Love it. The toothbrush holder I had before was ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The toothbrush holder I had before was not open in the bottom so the leftover toothpaste/water would always gather at the bottom. I constantly had to clean it. This is so much better and I like that it has a place for the toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Eleana Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this product. It can hold 4 toothbrushes, a couple of tubes of toothpaste and it has little rubber feet on the bottom to keep it stable and steady. And as a bonus - I didn't even know this came with it - there are four extra little feet in case you lose any, and 5 toothbrush holder heads of all different colors. I wasn't expecting that little bonus. Excellent deal!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Blasingame

customer_reviews.title: Sink Organizer FTW
customer_reviews.text: Love this toothbrush organizer for the bathroom. It has large enough spaces for thicker toothbrushes, doesn't have a solid base so water isn't collected at the bottom, and there are even large enough spots for electric toothbrushes and toothpastes.
customer_reviews.author: Polished Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Very simple and clean storage
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to hold my standard toothbrushes and toothpaste without taking up space. The stand came in the next day and in a brand new box. I was delighted to find extra leg grips in the box, if I need to replace in the future. The design is just as the picture shows. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JENN B.

customer_reviews.title: Fits in small spaces, very easy to clean, looks nice, holds more than just toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.text: I love love my toothbrush holder. This is the second one I ordered from this company. I like how it's small and holds all my children's toothbrushes and toothpaste. Also for this particular one, I ordered it to hold our electric toothbrushes which is something I needed to keep my bathroom counter organized and neat. I will definitely use this company again and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lele

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's made for
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's made for, but doesnt hold all toothbrush sizes. My husband's toothbrush is skinny and falls through the bottom but it's more of an OCD thing if you dont want your toothbrush touching anything! Other than that holds toothbrushes and toothpaste at an affordable price
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Most hygienic holder I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: I love the openness of it so I can just wipe off the counter easily, and have no puddling on the holder surface. These easily holds four toothbrushes, even individual battery-operated ones, and a tube of toothpaste. I’m buying another for the other bathroom - 5 grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: JanH

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything I need
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my purchase! Fits everything I need it to! I was having a hard time finding something that would hold my electric toothbrush and toothpaste. This is perfect! plus I got an extra surprise that I did not realize was included or maybe it didn't state that it was. Little covers for toothbrushes is an array of colors!
customer_reviews.author: Jen T

customer_reviews.title: Nice and clean
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toothbrush holder. It keeps the bottom of my toothbrush clean (there is no accumulation of water in the bottom). I can fit several items. Plenty of space for electric toothbrush and toothpaste. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Joegalle

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to organize my two son's bathroom. Works well and seems to be holding up nicely. I like it because it drains easily onto the counter and can be wiped up so there's no "gunk" at the bottom of a toothbrush holder.
customer_reviews.author: WoodlandFairy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a metal cup like toothbrush holder that was definitely getting funky in the bottom despite cleaning repeatedly. This is excellent. I like that it is sectioned off and I have my razor, toothbrush, and toothpaste all in it. I also like that there is no bottom so that it wont get mucky and is so easy to clean. It also came with extra rubber feet!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer donnella

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and cost effective
customer_reviews.text: Very effective and cost saving. As compared to other plastic or closed ones, this set looks very good quality steel ( I will wait for few months to see if it rusts or loses shine/ color). The structure is simple and stable. Keeping one heavy toothpaste does not make it lean or unstable. The usual brush slot may not accommodate an electric brush. Two for this price is a steal. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DSR

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to toothpaste gunk in a cup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our family after fighting a losing battle of toothbrush cups building up gunk and mold. It has worked out very well. I especially appreciate that it can fit my larger electric toothbrush in the slot designated for toothpaste. My only concern was that two of the spots where there should have been "feet" to hold it up were jagged metal stumps that didn't reach the same depth as the other feet. I'm not sure if it was a manufacturing defect, but it is sharp and might cut someone. However, the other feet hold the entire unit up very well and unless you lift the entire piece up, you should have no problem with scraping a finger.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: I was so sick of hard to clean toothbrush holders! As we are a family of four, our toothbrush areas are hit hard. I bought this to keep the toothpaste from wandering off. It stores the toothbrushes and toothpaste nicely. My only issue is that there is no bottom tray, so the water off the toothbrush’s just drops down on the vanity top, can’t seem to teach my crew to wipe them off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! I don't have to clean a holder out anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Tired of trying to clean spittle out of your toothbrush holder? This thing is perfect! And, I love that it holds my toothpaste. My husband uses it for razor, toothpaste and toothbrushes. I use mine for toothpaste and two toothbrushes, one which is electric. Nice sized holes for wider toothbrush handles.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lavine

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! So easy to clean. My other one I had would collect all the water on the bottom and get so gross. But not this one! It’s also pretty small so it doesn’t take up a whole lot of space either. Gives it a nice, clean, and organized look.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is so convenient and so cute. It also has plenty of space to fit other necessities that are hogging up your counter space. It comes with toothbrush caps. Which is a great addition. Thank you for the additional item as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: This can't be stainless steel, it rusts!
customer_reviews.text: This can't be stainless steel, it rusts! So this is either false advertising or outright lying! We've owned it one year, and it started rusting a few months ago. Check out my photo. It's not the $7.99, it's the lie.
customer_reviews.author: S BLUM

customer_reviews.title: Corrodes after a few months
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be "stainless steel" but it is showing signs of rust after a few months especially at the joints. I have a ceramic thing that is similar. I like the air circulation feature, but it should not be rusting this soon.
customer_reviews.author: Pathfinder

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller then it looks in the pictures but it very nice. Fits toothbrushes/toothpaste nicely. Doesn't take up much counter space which is a plus. Has little rubber things on the bottom helps keep it from getting knocked off.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Declutter your bathroom sink.
customer_reviews.text: This product holds 4 toothbrushes and at least one toothpaste tube. It comes in it's own little box, multiple toothbrush covers and extra rubber feet bottoms device itself. I included (2) pictures of everything provided. That's all.
customer_reviews.author: grand-poobah

customer_reviews.title: Toothbrush Holder Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband but guess what? He let me have it! I have it on my counter and am so glad I bought it. My toothbrush doesn't lay on the sink now and this stand allows it to air dry. Great find.
customer_reviews.author: Sheriindallas

customer_reviews.title: It's not all stainless steal, it rusted a little on me.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it held my toothbrush and toothpaste. But didn't like the fact that it rusted a little bit on me. if it says stainless steal that's what it should be. I'm not satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product for the Price Point
customer_reviews.text: Someone actually thought out the needs in relation to the product. It's perfect. No Toothbrush crud in the bottom of a stand to forget about until it turns brown, any drainage drips to your counter where it is cleaned normally and regularly. It ships with color-coded brush caps for those who like their brush head covered. Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.author: David Lingle

product_meta.title: HBlife Stainless Steel Bathroom Toothbrush Holder Toothpaste Holder Stand
product_meta.description:
Color:Silver| Size:SmallSpecification: 
- Material:Stainless Steel 
- Color:Silver 
- Product Size:Approximate(L*W*H) 4.76*2.36*3.94 inches (12.1*6*10 cm) 

Package Included: 
1 x HBlife Stainless Steel Bathroom Toothbrush Holder
feature_bullets: CONSTRUCTION: 4 Toothbrush Slots, 1 Toothpaste Slot; Precise and considerate size slots is suitable for most Toothbrush and Toothpaste in daily life. Meet the needs of a family of four.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL: Super light weight and compact size, but enough storage to put toothbrush, toothpaste, shaver,facial cleanser ,comb,eyebrow trimmer and so on. Total Size:4.76*2.36*3.94inch(12.1*6*10cm); Toothbrush Slot Size:1.02*1.02inch(2.6*2.6cm);Toothpaste Slot:2.2*2.09inch(5.6*5.3cm).
PREMIUM MATERIAL: Made of selected food grade stainless steel, Never Rust, glossy surface never fade, durable use for a long time.

FINE WORKMANSHIP: Adopt skilled welding process with polished endpoints, even welding and stable joint, beautiful wavy design and fashion simple looks; Good Ventilation performance, Water drain quickly, every details showing its high-end.
STABLE: Super even foots ensure its stability, you can put it in any place of bathroom or small apartment, never worried about your Toothbrush or Toothpaste fall out.
